website_summaries.verdict: A highly cushioned running shoe for women that's perfect for long runs.
pros: A range of colors from purple to teal are available for this shoe
Cloud-like cushioning is great for long runs, and there's plenty of arch support in the mid-foot area
The comfortable cushioning doesn't weigh down the shoe, so the ride is light enough to feel natural

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and support!
customer_reviews.text: Relied on Brooks’ neutral Ghost since Ghost 6 while recovering from plantar fasciitis years ago. Has a comfortable footbed on its own, which can easily be replaced with a prescription orthotic. Happily, new neutral colors of the Ghost 11 and 12s make the Ghost even more appealing since, at 70 yrs old, my days of cutesy flats are about over. So back to wearing Ghost! Most important to do so after a torn tendon in my foot wearing those cutesy flats along with bunions and arthritic knees now too. Am a very active walker, not runner.
customer_reviews.author: a mom

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've been jogging a lot lately and my muscles down my shins have been bothering me. I did a 3 mile run today and I love the shoes. Soft absorbs shock well and plenty of toe room. Excellent arch support for a high arch
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: SO COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried when I read the reviews for these shoes. These are my first pair of brooks. I am going to be an ER Nurse and will be on my feet for 12+ hours. I have wide feet so I ordered my normal size + wide (women's). They fit perfectly and the width is excellent for my foot. Looking forward to wearing them!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Order before they're gone!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Same great support as the 10 and 11, little more in the heel. Hard to find in a wide so i got two!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Bought both a black pair and a grey pair and the black pair don't feel as comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought both a black pair and a grey pair and the black pair don't feel as comfortable...go figure...same size...same style.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S. Farkas

customer_reviews.title: Only got one shoe
customer_reviews.text: The one shoe I got was great but I have two feet so I’m hoping they will send me the other one!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Love Brooks shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I never owned a pair of Brooks till this year and boy was I missing out. The comfort level is by far better than Nike, Adidas, or New Balance in my opinion. This particular model of shoe is a neutral shoe, which is still very supportive and comfortable. The color gray is very attractive yet simple. My only complaint and reason I had to return was the fact that I wear a wide shoe and these Ghosts did not feel wide like the Brooks Adrenlines I also own. Could have just been a a missed tag on the shoe or box, either way still very much impressed with Brooks shoes and reordered another a pair of Brooks.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Holmes

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing!!!!!’
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy! As soon as I put them on I went running around my complex, I wasn’t even in workout gear! They are so comfortable!! I feel light as air and there is zero toe squishing which is the problem I had with my Misuno wave’s and I have narrow/slim feet?! At one point during my trial run I saw a tree and actually thought I could scale it! I knew better than to try but I was feeling as light as air!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet!!
customer_reviews.text: My feet thank you! This is the second pair of Ghost running shoes I’ve enjoyed and they are light as a feather and give great support. Brooks makes a wonderful shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Azriella

customer_reviews.title: Wont last long
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Brooks Ghost runners for many years and have had good success just ordering the latest style/number. Unfortunately these Ghost 12 are breaking down in the heel cup support making it nearly impossible to put on shoes over socks without nearly unlacing them. The top is very stretchy making them less supportive for walking (my primary use) on uneven surfaces like unpaved trails. And the insole is becoming less supportive even though the shoes are not yet 5 months old. Will be rethinking my commitment to this line.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne L. Moger

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Only about a month of wear and the bottom sole is already breaking apart! Found this on the ground in the middle of a workout from the side of my shoe. Shoes kept inside, only had about 5 runs outside and always workout on mats. Shouldn’t be falling apart so quickly. No durable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Florist favorite!
customer_reviews.text: As a busy floral designer I am on my feet 8 hours a day. I have tried every brand out there (Skechers, New Balance, Nike, etc) and Brooks are the best by far. Expensive, yes. But I am able to get six months out of a pair of these before they blow out and at five shifts a week, that averages out a day to about a $1.20. Considering that I don't go home in pain and I'm not limping through my shifts, that makes THESE shoes my favorite. I have hardware from a broken foot in my left foot and arthritis and plantar fascitis in my right...and these are the best shoes I have ever worn. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: They were great when I first got them, but they definitely don't wear as a wide like I ordered. My pinky toe has pinch blisters on the pad because of it. I walk about 7 miles a day in them, roughly 6 days a week. I'm disappointed in the fact that I received them 3 weeks ago and they're already wearing out. I have flat feet, and they were one of the top shoes rated for people that need the arch support. I'm sad that this is the 2nd pair of $100+ shoes I've received I'm the last 4 months and already they're wearing out.
customer_reviews.author: mrs.d

customer_reviews.title: Wear All Day
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the real deal! I have extremely flat feet. These shoes are comfortable; my feet don’t hurt at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, great support and cushion
customer_reviews.text: Using for jogging/walking. Truly amazing, have had no foot soreness at all 40+ miles in after not having walked or jogged for years. Truly great cushion and support for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: James D.

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. This is my second pair, however my first pair were Ghost 11's. These are great too, and they fit to size!! My forever shoes! Update 7/28/2020 These shoes are good. In my opinion, they do not have the same support as the 11's. I tend to lean a little when I walk and the 12's don't support the front and sides of my foot like the 11's (foot doesn't feel as snug, or the material isn't strong enough 🤔), so my lean looks mean 😫. When I purchase another pair, I am definitely going for the 11's, if I can find them.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen K.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Love these Ghost 12 shoes. They are wider in the toe like the ghost 10’s were. Cushion is great.
customer_reviews.author: rmathews

customer_reviews.title: Size is smaller than previous Ghost 12. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Completely different from my other Ghost 12. It seems much smaller on my right foot. After the run my nails are sore, one nail is now purple and it hurts... I don’t understand what happened to the shoe size. Be careful buy it.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Ghost 12, not at all like previous Ghosts...
customer_reviews.text: I've worn the Brooks Ghost for at least the last 6 models. They have always been my go to running shoe and in the past I could have run a marathon out of the box in these. The Ghost 12 has changed and not in a good way. The back of the shoe comes up about a 1/3 of an inch higher that the others. It doesn't sound like much, but they have worn a very painful hole in my heel. I'm so sad that Brooks totally messed up this shoe! Hope they fix the 13s. If I could find the 11s, I'd buy them all in my size! I had to return these.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed, I have had Brooks Glycerin and Revel shoes and was exciting to try the Ghost (even at full price!). When I went to a local foot store they recommended Brooks Ghost based on my foot measurements. I received them in the time frame promised with no issue. Tried them on and they felt like good ole Brooks but about 15 steps on the carpet and I could tell they were not going to work, it was causing the ball of my left foot to ache. If 15 steps caused that, I knew they were not a keeper and sadly returned them for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Odie

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable literally feels like I'm walking on air. The support is there! When I'm running the toes have room to spread out. Even when I'm just walking it feels so cushioned. My knee usually bothers me when I'm running on pavement but after I switched to these shoes my knee no longer hurts from the run. It is so true that running shoes need to retired after 300-400 miles. I used to keep my shoes till they just wore out. Big mistake that thankfully I've learned. You can't go wrong with these! I've been getting Brooks for a few years now and have loved every pair.
customer_reviews.author: Charli Powers

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend for long shifts at work
customer_reviews.text: I got these for work shoes since my job is now requiring all black shoes for in the pharmacy. I've used Brooks Running shoes in the past for work and I have had no issues. These do not provide much support and truly are not comfortable after like 6 hours of standing.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Support and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great for all terrain running! I jog at least 4 times a week 4to 5 each day.These tennis shoes have great support. I don’t feel any pain in my toes from the stress. I would recommend this to anyone who runs And need quality support and comfort. I bought both of my sisters each of her as a room as well. I did buy them a half a size bigger as they do seem a little bit smaller than a other tennis shoes To give my toes room with the socks;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality/Price/looks
customer_reviews.text: Love these Brooks! Comfortable with great support! Never had this brand before but I definitely will purchase again. They’re a little pricey but you get what you pay for. A little tip..if you have ever got a hole in the toe of your shoes, put a small piece of duck tape inside the toe portion of the shoes before wearing. I wear a size 7, ordered 7-1/2. Fits perfectly with socks. You won’t regret buying these Brooks. I got the blue two tone. Beautiful color & have got many compliments. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: DONNA A.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet! Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these shoes to run for 3-4 miles for four days in a row last week. They took me a day or two to get used to the new feel because these are my first Brooks pair, but i can tell that my feet LOVE them! No weird rubbing areas and my knees and hips feel the change in support. I was worried when they seemed to have little to no ankle support, but hours and days after the run, my feet feel happy :) They fit pretty snug.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Anderson

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: These are without question the most comfortable shoes I have owned in a very long time. Brooks now has me as a convert. They hug my heal, give me a spring to my step. I seem to be propelled forward. I bought them mainly for walking. We (used to) travel a lot and I insist on good sturdy shoes. These are somewhat bigger looking on my feet, but with the light weight and comfort I don't care. I just bought my second pair. I got them before they are totally replaced by the Ghost 13. My former brand has managed to change the shoe of choice for a much inferior model. I hoping Brooks will not be the same.
customer_reviews.author: R. Evans

customer_reviews.title: New model very poor fit!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Ghosts for years but the most recent model has an incredibly poor fit/cut around the lip of the back upper ankle. It angles inward and rubs on your high ankle. Both feet have horrible blisters. Unfortunately there is not a way to stretch that part of the shoe. Purchased my usual full size larger to accommodate for foot swelling. The room needed is fine but that part is a deal breaker even after several miles and weeks. These are going straight in the garbage. Brooks...go back to the drawing board on these, please!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca W

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I have traditionally not been a fan of Brooks, typically an ASICS girl, but I am very impressed with these shoes. Right out of the box they felt heavy/clunky but when I put them on I def saw the appeal. The toe box allows plenty of room for my slightly wider feet. I did NOT have to break them in, which is a huge plus for me. I have owned these shoes for a few months and they are good for short-distance runs but much better for long-distance runs, as they are very stable and comfortable. Would def recommend them for the beginning and advanced runner alike, also would be very good for walking as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Davis

customer_reviews.title: First time runner: Great comfort and just enough cushion
customer_reviews.text: These are my first "pro" running shoes. This is my first time training to run, too. I'm almost 50 years old and the cushion is excellent for my troubled joints. I typically wear a 7.5 M in other athletic shoes (Adidas, for example) and think these fit me great. Straight out of the box comfortable...I took to the pavement for the first time and did a quick half mile fir test. No worry about pain or recovery time. I really think they are great!
customer_reviews.author: The Bee

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I love Brooks Shoes and use the Levitate model for working out. I ordered this shoe in the same size as my Levitates to be a walking shoe. Brought them on a trip to wear and found them to be way too tight and too short. I had to wear them as they were all I brought on the trip. I ended up losing the nails off my big toes. Probably should order a half to full size larger than usual.
customer_reviews.author: KC417

customer_reviews.title: Way too small!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several pair of Brooks Ghost series shoes in the past and all have been true to size except for this one. What's really weird is that I have another pair of Ghost 12's that fit just fine, but this one definitely didn't. When I went to return the shoes at Kohl's, there were two other ladies that were returning the same product for the same reason. Amazon service was great, though.
customer_reviews.author: myway

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I was in need of a new pair of good tennis shoes since I started exercising again. I have terrible feet; potential plantar fasciitis and broke right foot at one point . They hurt most times when I just walk and not to mention a more intense workout; they get to the point of going almost numb they hurt so bad. I took a two mile walk this evening after just getting them and my feet didn’t hurt once. Very comfortable. Seem great for my arched feet! Also, size was perfect. I’m a close size 7 so that’s what i ordered and still had some room. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H.

customer_reviews.title: Not for short socks
customer_reviews.text: At first, I absolutely loved the shoe. When I put it on, my feet immediately felt fantastic and I could not wait to get my morning run in. However, about halfway through a 3 mile run, I had to stop because of the back of my right heel. The shoe was rubbing up against it so hard that it was ripping skin away from my ankle. As supportive and comfortable as these are, I will have to return just because the heel does that. I would recommend the shoe but it would definitely depend on the type of socks you wear (I prefer short) and where the shoe falls on your ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: The best shoe all around for long hours on your feet and highly active people.
customer_reviews.text: I am a RN who works 12.5 hour shifts on a busy unit. I also am an active person. I have spent countless hours researching and purchasing many top brand sneakers. I have soreness in the ball of my foot which was worse while wearing my Dansko clogs. I like Newton running shoes especially for forefront comfort. The Ghost shoe not only provides this forefront comfort but also support throughout the shoe. I pronate and have flat feet. I normally wear insoles from my podiatrist. When wearing the Brooks Ghost all I need is a pair of socks and the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Midwestern mom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fit and the feel of the shoe. However, after less than a month of wear, the heel of the left shoe was coming unglued. I was past the 1 month return time but was not willing to keep these defective shoes. After some work, I was finally able to talk with someone at Amazon and the shoes were accepted for a return and I got a full refund. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: owenmeany

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best, most comfortable shoes I have ever worn! I have been a Brooks an for years, and these are the best! I bought a pair of these in store about 6 months ago, and ordered this second pair through Amazon. They were much cheaper through Amazon and exactly the same as the store-bought. I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: R. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Took away foot pain
customer_reviews.text: I am normally a 5.5 to 6 and I got a 6. These are wonderful shoes. I try to run 3 miles a day and I work on my feet all day in steal toes. When I put these on to run my feet don’t hurt like in other shoes. I even bought $150+ shoes because my feet hurt so much. These are amazing. I do have to say after two months the amazing feeling turns to an ok feeling but you are suppose to buy new shoes every so many miles but I can’t afford to keep doing that. I would say these are mid priced shoes and totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: suz

customer_reviews.title: Great! But runs small...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super cushioned and comfortable! They’re great for running, walking or any cardio related activity. I love them so far and think they’re a great buy! I know it says these shoes run true to size, but that wasn’t the case for me. I’m typically a 7.5 and originally purchased an 8..... however I had to return them and order a 8.5 because they run a full size too small. I spoke to a few friends of mine and they alllllll had the same issue. Just keep that in mind! Otherwise I’m happy
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Romero

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Pair of Brooks Women's Athletic Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I got this pair about 3 weeks after I received my first pair of Brooks women's athletic shoes. The first pair was tearing within 3 weeks of wearing, but this pair, shoe seems to be holding up so far. Time will tell. Suffering chronic pain illnesses over 35 years, I really need shoe support and comfort. Brooks seems to be a very good line of shoes, but each shoe is different because any supplier can sell you a shoe that does not hold up at some point. However I am real happy with these, my 2nd pair of Brooks women's athletic shoes....
customer_reviews.author: Peggy L. Piskor

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am a nurse and bought these for the long 12 hour shifts on my feet. These shoes kill my feet and make my back hurt. Another pair of shoes to the trash. Never going to find shoes that help my back and feet, I guess. These shoes were recommended on a nursing forum and still are not right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile colors, great cushiony support, very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Brooks makes really solid, comfortable sneakers. I had developed shin pain (shin splints) in an aerobics class and the teacher recommended Brooks for better support than what I was wearing. It worked and since then I've had 3 pairs of Brooks (different colors over the years). I highly recommend these above any other I've tried, incl. all the well-known brands. This granite, pale pinky accents combo is a great color for summer. Very comfortable, cushiony, not too heavy or clunky - I'm very happy with these sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Not what they say
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers have a weird fit...too roomy in the toe area and foot slides. If you are a half size neither the proper size or the next one up fits. Feet were sore after 2.5 miles and I run distance. Stick with the Glycerin.
customer_reviews.author: SFLA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bunions and Lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: I am 5ft approximately 145lbs usually wear a 6.5 and purchased the 6.5 ghost 12 and it fits perfectly. I have the beginnings of a bunion on one foot - needless to say finding shoes to walk in has been difficult. These are great so far! Did a 2 mile trail hike today and normally my lower back would be soar and my foot would be in a lot of pain... I am feeling like I could easily do two more without an issue! This is the first time I wore them so I can only imagine they will get better with age.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderer81

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: According to Brooks the Ghost is supposed to be like theIr discontinued shoe Defyance, which was perfect right out of the box for me. Sadly I can’t say the same about this one. I normally wear a 9 in Brooks, but could have gone up to a 91/2 in this shoe. Also my foot slides around in it because there’s no support. I guess my search continues☹️
customer_reviews.author: ShayShay

customer_reviews.title: Runs small. Weird fabric
customer_reviews.text: Runs small and the heel is higher than others by Brooks. This is the only pair that has given me a blister on my heel. The fabric is a weird tweed look. Returned
customer_reviews.author: freckles28

customer_reviews.title: Ghost 12 not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: Very tight fit printed out label as soon as l tried on. Overall fit not as expected. I own a pair of Glycerin 16 fits like a glove lots of cushion. Ghost 12 size 9M terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Mattie

customer_reviews.title: Second pair of the very most comfortable shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Brooks Ghost 12 that I have purchased but I have purchased many versions of Brooks Ghost. This version is my favorite. I have always worn a size 10 in running shoes but in the last couple versions of Ghost, I have had to size up a half size, 10-1\2. I have raved so much on these that one co-worker has bought a pair and 2 others are planning to get a pair each. I love the color of these and my gray pair. I wear them everywhere. They are not just for running
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: The best shoe -ever-for me!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how much wearing this shoe has improved my lower back pain. I work at a stand up desk and because of back issues have to stand more than I can sit. So standing and being on my feel for over 8 hours is not uncommon. Since I started wearing Brooks Ghost 13's everything is better. Now I roitate between 3 different pair and will continue to use them til I need to replace them. Tossing out lots of old shoes -my husband is thrilled; more room in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These are light as a feather and durable. So comfortable to run in. Nice cushioning, & very comfortable on the heel strike. The laces are non slip, so the shoes won’t loosen up which was a nice surprise. I think Brooks runs a bit small. I always buy a half size larger. They fit like a charm. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from shin splints, plantar fasciitis, and I have high arches. I've been buying $60 cheap shoes twice a year finally did some research and had the money to buy these shoes and I have to say it has saved my legs. The support on these shoes is exceptional and I would recommend them to anybody who has Arch issues and leg pain.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet Coil

customer_reviews.title: COUNTERFEIT
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think these are legitimate. My first pair of Ghost 12s were awesome. As soon as I slipped these on I was like what’s wrong with them. I recommend buying from the Brooks website instead because i seriously think these are fake.
customer_reviews.author: Bliss Forest

customer_reviews.title: Shoes Are Sized So Incorrectly It's Insane -- WAY Too Small
customer_reviews.text: The reviews indicated that this Brooks Ghost 12 shoe was a normal fit. I typically wear a size 10.5 and this shoe is sized SO small it's comical. I thought it had to have been an error in how the shoe was sized. I ordered the same shoe in an 11 and again it's incredibly WAY too small. This shoe is sized so poorly I thought it was a mistake. I attached a picture showing an old ASICS running shoe that's a 10.5 next to this Brooks shoes that's supposedly a size 11? Are you kidding me? I don't get it but I've NEVER had a sizing issue that's so completely incorrect. Really, really frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Hazelton

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but so worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about Brooks Ghost shoes. I stand all day at work and the cushion is awesome. I now have a pair for work and home. I will not buy any other shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Lablvr

customer_reviews.title: Ghost 12 Rounded toe, more room than Ghost 11
customer_reviews.text: I love this show. Unfortunately, size 8.5 was too large, returned and ordered 8. The size 8 shoes fit perfectly! Return process easy. Ordered a second pair in another color. I wore Ghost 10 and loved it. Ghost 11 fit different and didn't work for me, the toe box was narrowed and seemed shorter. The new Ghost 12 is similar to the 10, but actually better. Toe box is a bIt more rounded and fits better. It doesn't rub my toes like the11 did. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable feel like I’m walking on clouds except for the insanely high drop of 12mm makes you feel like you are standing on your toes. The only reason they are still comfortable is all the cushion. I’m not able to wear all day because of the drop. It feels pinched where I’m standing on my toes on the topsides if I walk more than a couple miles or hours. Lots of cushion and smooth ride though. Never met a pair of brooks I didn’t like
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Chicoine

customer_reviews.title: Best lightweight running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Just got these about a week ago, used 3 times so far running around my neighborhood. Pavement and grass, about 20-30 minutes each time I went out. So far, so good. My previous pair of Brooks were the Levitate series and I loved those so much. The Ghost series is like an upgrade, same lightweight style but more supportive and great color options. Only reason I’m not giving 5 stars so far is I’m waiting to see how much use I get out of them (longevity factor). Will purchase from this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: LAURENM

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kicks
customer_reviews.text: These are more of periwinkle blue than gray or granite but they still look good. They’re super lightweight and seem like they will do well for workouts. I used them around the house to test. So far so good and would recommend. (Don’t mind the black work socks in the photos.)
customer_reviews.author: MLR

customer_reviews.title: Vendor issue: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: I love my Brooks running shoes. I love them so much that, when my last pair wore out after a year, I decided to buy an identical pair. Only problem is that the pair I thought I had ordered was not what I got. This vendor uses an image for the all black running shoe, but you actually receive a black upper, white soled shoe. I know, petty of me to be upset about this. Still, I the vendor page is misleading. Choose a different vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes on the market!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have three pair of these shoes. My only hope is that Brooks never stops making this particular style. I walk about 7 miles a day....Not a runner but definitely put miles on these great shoes. I walk on rough trails and they support like no other sneaker I have ever worn!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chicksters

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I love Brooks and have worn them for years but this pair has two holes near the big toe that started ripping after 1 month of low usage. Not the standard Brooks quality I am used to so this was a very disappointing purchase
customer_reviews.author: Beverly McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Supportive and light weight
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the greatest. In this latest release the toe bed was widened., which I Love. The shoes are comfortable, supportive, and light. I am a customer for life as long as they stay true to this design.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa N

customer_reviews.title: Design and fit has changed radically over 4 years of buying this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Over the course of 3 years I’d bought the last two versions of this same shoe with satisfactory results. This third pair seem as if they were a completely different shoe! They leave my feet in pain after a hour or two on my feet and I can barely finish an 8 hour shift in them. They must be outsourcing to a different manufacturer or the “last” used to make the shoe has been completely redesigned.
customer_reviews.author: drvredeveld

customer_reviews.title: They increased my pace per mile.
customer_reviews.text: Loved my shoes! They were exactly as described. They even increased my pace by 19 seconds per mile which was a very exciting surprise. They definetly exceeded my expectations. I also love the color. I purchased Brooks ghost 11 last year and Brooks launch the year before, and love their shoes. These shoes gave me more of a launch forward motion and a air lift which obviously increased my pace.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Geer

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shoe of all time. I use them for trail running, treadmill running and walking. This is my 3rd pair of Ghost 12’s...yes, you read the right. I bought the Ghost 13’s and my ankles, knees and hips were killing me so I returned them for these tried and true shoes. My feet are a tad narrow and these are not sloppy at all like the Ghost 13’s were. I have high arches and these offer great support. I am a neutral runner. I average 18-20k steps a day.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Great 👟
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are comfortable. They run slightly small, but a larger size would be too big. Hoping they loosen up a bit. Other than that, great sneakers Update: I did not want to change it so ordered a size larger and fit WAY much better. I have an older version of Brooks Ghost and the 8.5 fit fine, but these are smaller and the 9 is a better fit. My suggestion is to order a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby2010

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these shoes a little over a month. All I do is walk in them and each shoe has several rips in the material already and one shoe just had the tab loop ripped off completely. I’m super bummed especially for how much I paid 😔
customer_reviews.author: Emilee

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous with short life
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, but I am so disappointed that they are already showing wear in the material. It is almost worn away in one area. For the price, I would have expected more longevity than a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Annie G

customer_reviews.title: Made well & comfy but not great arch support
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes and they are comfortable. I didn’t give 5 stars though because I thought these would have better arch support than they do. After doing co side table research on which running shoe offered the most arch support for high arches, these are the ones I landed on. They have some arch support but not as much as they advertise. Maybe the cushioning will “conform” to my arches?
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: pretty ok
customer_reviews.text: I just don't know what to do as a runner that strikes on the outer foot. The previous version was great but with wear caused pain. These, even in a larger size, are already causing pain so the support is not quite the same.
customer_reviews.author: KateLyns

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes in March and it is now July and they have a hole in them. I wear them every other day and am not a runner, so I didn't run 6 miles a day in them. I started to notice the last pair I bought got a hole in the same place too. Just disappointed that for as much money as they are, they didn't last 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, however, toe bumper pulling apart after two months of indoor use.
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Brooks Ghost athletic shoes for MANY years and have loved everything about them. Purchased a new pair of Brooks Womens Ghost 12 on 6-24-2020 through Amazon, fulfilled by Road Runner Sports. I've only worn them indoors as my "house shoes". Within two months the toe bumpers started pulling away from the shoe. I've never experienced this before. Very disappointed as it's seemingly too late to return or exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazingly comfortable. Was not sure that a good running shoe would make that much of a difference since I was never really into it until the coronavirus forced me to make the outdoors my gym. These are a game changer. They are nice and light, and don’t need to be broken in. I noticed a big difference in my running after switching to these shoes. Very comfy for long walks as well.
customer_reviews.author: R. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Best running sneaker
customer_reviews.text: My son has been telling me to try Brook’s sneakers for years. I run every day and I am very picky about how things feel on my body especially my feet. This sneaker gives me plenty of toe space, support, and cushion. I usually cannot wait to get my sneakers off but this sneaker I am happy to leave On for hours after my run. It is that comfortable and light weight. There is no going back for me now!! Smart kid!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great athletic shoe
customer_reviews.text: May not be the prettiest athletic shoe out there but certainly are comfortable and stable. They last a long time. I've even washed them when they get a bit to dirty. Wear them every day for dog walking, gym work outs. I do not run. I own 3 pair. Try to keep one pair a little tidier for casual travel or occasions where sneakers are ok but you just don't want them to look too ragged.
customer_reviews.author: ski girl

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes and yes!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Brooks for quite a while now and I love the comfort, fit, and look of these shoes. I have flat feet and these provide me with great stability. I wear these about 12 hours a day for work and my back is feeling great. I have chronic lower back pain and my chiropractor wanted me to wear sport shoes on the daily. These shoes are definitely a good choice for anyone with back issues.
customer_reviews.author: nana-che

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow heel and these are one of 2 brands that fit great (Mizunos also work). Light weight and nice support. I don't run or walk more than a couple of miles so I can't comment on how they would feel on longer runs.
customer_reviews.author: Linny

customer_reviews.title: Love Brooks
customer_reviews.text: Cant go wrong with these. My 3rd pair. I need the arch support so these work good for me
customer_reviews.author: Tamra S

customer_reviews.title: Nice size toe box
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a 2 yr old pair of Brooks Ghost 10’s, so knew how comfortable these shoes were. My toes have broadened with age, so I needed a wide pair & these have a nice broad toe box. I bought 2 different sizes so I could try them on (my local stores were out of these sizes) and Amazon very nicely accepted a return of the one size, after I decided the 9 was best. I like the color too.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: So thankful to have discovered these shoes! I have feet issues but have never heard of Brooks brand until my foot place suggested I try these. They fit perfectly! Good support in arches, heels, toes. They do run small, so I had to order a half size larger, but thankfully they come in many sizes and widths. Reasonably priced compared to other high end shoes (which never fit as well or were as comfortable.) I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: I-read

customer_reviews.title: The tennis shoes I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I have always had a hard time finding comfortable tennis because I have a high arch and lower back pain. Well I'm extremely happy I found these Brooks Ghost 12 tennis shoe. They hug my arch and don't cause my lower back to hurt. I've walked all day wearing these for over a week straight everyday and NO pain! Woohoo buy these you won't be sorry...
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Maslowski

customer_reviews.title: Great for medical professionals!
customer_reviews.text: I work 12 hour shifts as an EMT in a ER/trauma unit. Constantly on my feet. Comfortable shoes are a must! I wear nothing but Brooks. I have owned several pair and these are by far my favorite. I always get a wide because my feet would hang over the sides of regular shoes and my feet would hurt worse. I never really paid attention. So my podiatrists suggested Brooks and to get them in wide and now thats all I wear for work. Perfect cusion and support. I love my Brooks!
customer_reviews.author: Evilgemini80

customer_reviews.title: Reliable shoe, great fit
customer_reviews.text: The perfect running shoe for a neutral striker looking for a comfortable fit. Not too cushy and not too firm. Roomy toe box so you don’t lose toe nails if you size up a half size, as I have always done with running shoes. I used to run in a ASICS Gel Cumulus until they ruined the design a few years back. These were highly recommended and did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Happy girl

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve run in this brand for years and usually love them. I have this same pair just bought a new pair - same model. This pair falls short. There is no support throughout the shoe. I’ve run 3-5 miles and my feet are aching by the time I’m home. I thought I’d give it some time but feet keep hurting. Maybe they were sitting on shelf too long? Who knows... Waste of money - pretty bummed about it. I’d give it zero for support.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Braun

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE GHOST 12s
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair. I was originally fitted in a running store, but have since ordered them online. This model is like walking on clouds, no need to break in. And better yet, no plantar fascitis or shin splints since I first started wearing them. WORTH EVERY PENNY. I've had blue, purple, and now these black and gold ones which are super pretty and match everything.
customer_reviews.author: Kmom

customer_reviews.title: I love Ghosts, and these do not disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: So far they are just like my other Ghosts! The box was very banged up... which made me question if the shoes were used! But upon inspection they were not! I have a neutral running gait and run about 3-5 times a week on outdoor flat surfaces. This will be my 6th pair of ghosts and I have had no knee pain since I used these! Mind you I have to buy a new pair every six months, though.
customer_reviews.author: Pjmorris

customer_reviews.title: Best running/working-nurse shoes ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Ghost 12. This is the only running shoes I ever want to wear again. I will eventually save money by not buying less expensive shoes that don’t last. Comfortable, durable and light weight. I don’t feel every little pebble outside. They arrived way earlier than was first reported.
customer_reviews.author: David Grove

customer_reviews.title: Custom fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a woman's size 8. The toe was right up to the end. This may be desired by a true runner. However, I am an elderly daily walker so I ordered a half size larger 8 and 1/2. It was perfect for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good brand of shoe. It just wasn’t a good fit.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were to large and wide. I have inserts for my shoes, from my Doctor. He suggested to try on shoes at a shoe store. To be sure of a good fit. The shoes have been returned. I would like a refund. Thank you.🤗 I am patiently waiting for my refund. As soon as I receive my refund I will start shopping again.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Berg

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair for myself and my wife. These are great sneakers. The mesh had tore some on mine so i'm not sure yet about durability but comfort wise they are outstanding. The XX wide are comparable to New Balance and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bckrupps37

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Brooks for the first time from my daughter’s referral , who’s a runner and OMG I can’t believe the difference in my feet, legs, and knees !!! I have over pronated ankles ( weak ankles) and these have the proper support I need. I find them true to size and most definitely will be staying with this brand from now on . Goodbye Nike’s!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but not great
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the Ghost 11 and was disappointed with these. These are stiffer than Ghost 11. Ghost 10's were nice too, but Ghost 11 was there best so far. However, this is my second pair of Ghost 12's b/c Ghost 13's weren't reviewed well by Running Shoe Guru. They said Ghost 13 were really wide and wore out quickly. I couldn't figure out another shoe so without options got Ghost 12 again. Sure hope Brooks is reading this and makes Ghost 14 more like Ghost 11.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Suski

customer_reviews.title: Great workout shoe with nice styling
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair of Brooks Ghost shoes. I really like this product. The cushioning is great as is the support. They come in a variety of colors that are stylish. I really like the textured gray material, it doesn't show dirt. Be sure to buy a 1/2 size up to avoid the toe pushing forward in the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisWP

customer_reviews.title: Sent a USED pair!!
customer_reviews.text: Paid $117 for them to send a USED pair of shoes. Absolutely disgusting. Immediately sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable, supportive and they look nice too. My only reason for giving four stars instead of five is that the tread wears relatively quickly. I walk a lot...8-10 miles a day...and I wish that the tread lasted longer. They are expensive for the length of time that they last. But I have zero complaints other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C

customer_reviews.title: Too small as my regular size
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color of these shoes.... but could only get a 6. Which is my typical size but in a walking/running shoe, I always get a 6.5. I really wanted to these work but they were too tight so I had to return them but ordered a 6.5 in a different color. The comfort on the bottom was amazing. So I’m excited to try the right size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have super bad feet that always give me issues. I didn’t a lot of research and decided to try out these sneakers after hearing good things. They were just as expected and I am very happy with them. I have high arches and I feel like these support my feel really well. I am very happy with my purchase! Recommend for sure!
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but very structured.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy shoe. Fantastic service from Road Runner Sports. Unfortunately the shoe is far too structured and the sole is not bendy enough for my running preferences and chose to return.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie M

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I've gone from Ascis to Brooks then Asics back to Brooks. I seemed to have fit issues with the yearly changes. I love this fit. I am an avid runner and my knee pain is gone having switched back to Brooks. These are very comfortable and provide good arch support. They are an attractive color/design.
customer_reviews.author: S. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes. They have much more cushion and security than what I was working out in. My one complaint is that I do tend to get cramps in my arches while working out but they are less than my old shoes. It could just be something with my feet and have nothing to do with the shoe. i would definitely recommend these to other people.
customer_reviews.author: Angela L.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and provides good support
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the color of these Brooks. I ordered a 10 Wide and they fit as expected. Very comfortable and would recommend to others looking for good support and comfort. I purchased them for walking and have had several pair of Brooks in the past as well. I would purchase these again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: OH lady

product_meta.title: Brooks Ghost 12
feature_bullets: It is a smooth ride ahead with the easy flexibility, long-lasting durability, and reliable outsole grip of the Brooks® Ghost 12 running shoes.

Surface: Road. Differential: 12mm. Engineer mesh upper with 3D Print synthetic overlays offers a secure fit while providing easy flexibility. Traditional lace-up closure. Plush tongue and collar. Soft fabric lining for a great in-shoe feel. Removable foam insole for excellent underfoot comfort and support. BioMoGo DNA is a blend of earth-friendly BioMoGo and responsive Brooks DNA, and has a gender-friendly cushioning design, making for a dynamic ride. Full-length Segmented Crash Pad accommodat
